basic.description:
A study of the Bible in English from the Anglo-Saxon period to 1611 and of the use of biblical narrative, allusion, and symbolism by selected English writers.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L; 84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: English Bibles and English Literature

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  A grade of C in ENGL100/6.0 or registration in a RELS plan
